Name: Furry Sex Madness
About the game: Take on the role of a brave hero and save all the girls from behind or show your real porking skill in passing levels for a while! In this unusual platformer you will need not only to complete the levels with the help of agility, but also to apply your ingenuity. Diverse levels, each with its own unique playability! Unlock new characters, character coloring, new girls in the gallery and break records by finding more efficient ways to complete levels! Features of the game: * 6 unique and large, non-linear levels * 3 characters and skins that open to them * Huge gallery of musty girls that you can find in the levels * Unique movement system: tackle, dash in the air and grab walls * For hardock players, each level will give a challenge of time
